abstract: There were signs that banks were either lying about their results or were taking large risks that were not fully disclosed, but investors were oblivious.
snippet: There were signs that banks were either lying about their results or were taking large risks that were not fully disclosed, but investors were oblivious.
lead_paragraph: We should have known something was strange. The banks were doing a lot better than they should have been doing.

headline.main: As Bank Profits Grew, Warning Signs Went Unheeded
headline.print_headline: Bank Profits Had Whiff Of Suspicion
